/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. Overhead, a network of power lines crisscrosses the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The sky itself is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the frame, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and vehicles.
